amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Commission; report on higher education priorities.
amendatorysection.para: On or before March 15 of each year, the Coordinating Commission for Postsecondary Education shall provide electronically a report that evaluates progress toward attainment of the priorities listed in subdivision (3) of section 85-1428. The Education Committee of the Legislature shall review the report at a public hearing and report its findings electronically to the Legislature.
